Description: Available now at HeadlessUSA is a beautiful, Newburgh/USA-built white Steinberger XL2LF (lined fretless) bass. This bass was just restored and set-up by Jeff Babicz, who was the former head of production at the Steinberger Sound factory in Newburgh, N.Y. Jeff resurfaced the fingerboard, disassembled, cleaned and lubricated the bridge, and serviced the electronics. This bass is in near-mint condition and would certainly be a great addition to any Steinberger bass players collection. Jeff''s workmanship is legendary, and his abilities in Steinberger restoration are amazing. This bass in now in stunning condition. Since all of this work has been completed, this incredible bass should need no any further attention for the next 25 years. A perfect playing bass that's just been serviced by the world's top Steinberger tech, it plays and performs as well as (or probably better than) the day that it first left the factory. This Steinberger XL2LF bass will ship in a new black HeadlessUSA gig-bag with a new black cotton strap and a copy of Jeff's work-order. Purchasing your Steinberger from a trusted source is critical when dealing with these advanced technology instruments. Shipping is $85 within the lower 48 USA states. Rates to Alaska, Hawaii and Puerto Rico will vary. We're happy to ship overseas, so please contact us for an accurate shipping quote. If you have any questions, please e-mail us before ordering. Review our flawless feedback and order with confidence. Your complete satisfaction is our first priority. E-bayers with less than 10 feedbacks must contact us before ordering. We will only ship to a verified and confirmed PayPal address. We reserve the right to cancel this offering at any time. Thank you for your business!
Title: Vintage USA-Built White Steinberger XL2LF Fretless Bass-Restored by Jeff Babicz!
